about.bioText: I am a dedicated Software Engineer with a Bachelor's degree and a strong background in building scalable fintech platforms. My core philosophy revolves around writing clean, maintainable, and optimized code. I believe that every line of code should serve a clear purpose and be easily understandable, ensuring that development is sustainable and collaborative. With years of experience in the Vue.js ecosystem, TypeScript, and Agile methodologies, I focus on delivering high-performance solutions that stand the test of time.

item1.description: Key contributor in developing scalable fintech platforms for major subsidiaries like epay and XE. Specialized in building secure, high-performance web applications using Vue.js ecosystem. Led a major technical migration from Vue 2/Vuex to Vue 3/Pinia and JavaScript to TypeScript. Deeply involved in the full SDLC within an Agile environment, utilizing Jira, CI/CD pipelines (GitHub Actions), and analytics tools (Segment, LogRocket) to ensure code quality and user satisfaction.
